author: Daniel Ortiz-Hernandez
text:
Good Afternoon everyone, 
We are currently reviewing our department’s calls for service. We’re evaluating the types of calls we automatically dispatch officers to as we are experiencing a high number of calls that are not emergencies or do not require immediate police assistance.

We would like to know if your agency has dealt with this issue, if so how?
Are there any calls for service that your officers no longer automatically respond to?
Does your agency have a differential response program to triage non-priority calls?
Does you agency utilize a questionnaire for 911 operators to screen calls and determine if a crime or emergency is in progress?

Any assistance would be much appreciated,
Thank you!
title: Police Dept Calls for Service
